mapper.sql: SELECT s.id,s.system_id,name,s.parent_id,ancestors,classification_state,(select dept_name from sys_dept where dept_id = s.system_id) system_name,(SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = s.create_id) user_name, s.create_time,(SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = s.update_id) update_name, s.update_time, s.remark FROM jz_type s

SELECT s.id,s.system_id,s.name,s.parent_id,s.ancestors,classification_state,s.level,(select dict_label from sys_dict_data sdd where sdd.dict_type='risk_level' and s.level = sdd.dict_value) level_name, s.create_time,sd.dept_name system_name,su.user_name create_name,suu.user_name update_name, s.update_time, s.remark,(select name from jz_type jz where jz.id = s.parent_id) parent_name FROM jz_type s LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = s.system_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.user_id = s.create_id LEFT JOIN sys_user suu ON suu.user_id = s.create_id
mapper.select: -- SELECT s.id,s.system_id,s.name,s.parent_id,ancestors,classification_state, s.update_time, s.remark FROM jz_type s where s.id = #{id}
select dept_id as systemId,dept_name as systemName from sys_dept where parent_id=300

SELECT s.id,s.system_id,s.name,s.parent_id,s.ancestors,classification_state,(select dept_name from sys_dept where dept_id = s.system_id) system_name,(SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = s.create_id) user_name, s.create_time,(SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = s.update_id) update_name, s.update_time, s.remark FROM jz_type s,sys_dict_data d where s.classification_state = '0' and d.dict_type ='classification_of_state' order by d.dict_sort asc

select d.id,d.system_id,name, d.parent_id,d.ancestors,d.classification_state,d.create_time,d.create_id,update_time,update_id,d.remark,d.level ,(select name from jz_type where id = d.parent_id) parent_name, from jz_type d
d.id = #{id}
select id,system_id,name,parent_id,ancestors,classification_state,create_time,create_id,update_time,update_id,remark from jz_type where classification_state = #{stateid} and id!=100
select id,system_id,name,parent_id,ancestors,classification_state,create_time,create_id,update_time,update_id,remark from jz_type where classification_state=1 and parent_id=#{type}
select id,system_id,name,parent_id,ancestors,classification_state,create_time,create_id,update_time,update_id,remark from jz_type where classification_state=1 and parent_id!=#{type}
